Summary: Six bright white objects like lights in formation one leading last following two groups of three side by side. Sunny day not a cloud in the sky !
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around June 1st 1975
divs: Sighting DetailsI was about 4 to 6 years old sometime between 1975 ,and 1977. Did'nt know what a UFO was at the time ,so I never thought to tell anyone . I remember like yesterday ! Six round bright white light like objects flying in formation three on each side one leading ,last following . They traveled in a straight line north ,or north by northeast . It was a clear summer day . I was playing in the backyard of my home.
